mapper.select: select user_no , user_id , user_pwd , user_name , email , gender , phone , address , profile_url , signup_date , modify_date , status from member where status in ('Y','A') and user_id = #{userId}
select count(*) from member where user_id = #{checkId}
mapper.update: update member set email = null , gender = null , phone = null , address = null , profile_url = null , user_name = substr(user_name,1,1) || rpad('*', length(user_name)-1, '*') , status = 'N' , modify_date = sysdate where user_id = #{userId}
